title: How to Ratatwang your Panda
description: A mockbuster from the bargain bin about Chuck the Panda and a culinary team of rats.
altHero: a 3-D panda with a kung fu headband
alt1: the panda surrounded by rats wearing chef hats and holding culinary tools
alt3: the panda farts a smelly cloud on the rats
alt4: the rats are cheering in the cloud
